description:
go-mode: Works for both GNU-Emacs and XEmacs-21.5

Fixes some portability issues between the Emacsen.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Unfortunately I don't know enough about the various Emacs dialects to review this properly.  Anyone else on this list have a clue?

Mats, please review the contributor guidelines and sign the licence agreements:
http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html#copyright

[+ryanb]

On Tue, May 29, 2012 at 1:37 PM, <sameer@golang.org> wrote:

> Unfortunately I don't know enough about the various Emacs dialects to
> review this properly.  Anyone else on this list have a clue?
>
> Mats, please review the contributor guidelines and sign the licence
> agreements:
> http://golang.org/doc/**contribute.html#copyright<http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html#copyright>
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/**6206043/<http://codereview.appspot.com/6206043/>
>

Hi,

Thought I'd signed that long ago but I did it once again now, twice to
be precise(!),  just to be on the safe side.

About the review contributors guidelines: something specific I got
wrong or just a standard request for a new contributor?

2012/5/29  <sameer@golang.org>:
> Unfortunately I don't know enough about the various Emacs dialects to
> review this properly.  Anyone else on this list have a clue?
>
> Mats, please review the contributor guidelines and sign the licence
> agreements:
> http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html#copyright
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/6206043/
the elisp changes here look good to me. thanks for the contribution, mats!

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=83f7ee1fa792 ***

go-mode: Works for both GNU-Emacs and XEmacs-21.5

Fixes some portability issues between the Emacsen.

R=golang-dev, sameer, bradfitz, ryanb
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6206043

Committer: Sameer Ajmani <sameer@golang.org>

subject: code review 6206043: go-mode: Works for both GNU-Emacs and XEmacs-21.5
